EmailTemplate.description: "To be used as an initial response to customers who inquire about an ongoing outage. This is separare from the eloqua communication and to be used in SF case emails only"
EmailTemplate.name: Outage Template (NO ETA)
EmailTemplate.subject: Outage Template (NO ETA)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Customer Care at IHS Markit.
Please be informed that we are aware that our customers are experiencing intermitent system availability with {!Case.Product}.
Our technical and development teams are investigating to resolve this urgently. There is currently no ETA for a resolution but we will provide a further update as soon as we have any additional information.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit |Customer Care Email | Support Portal | Live Chat
